biotools.summary: Software package for advanced time-domain analysis of magnetic resonance spectroscopy (MRS) and spectroscopic imaging (MRSI) data. Through a user-friendly graphical interface biomedical researchers and clinical radiologists can use state-of-the-art signal processing algorithms to analyse and quantify spectroscopic data: from a single spectrum to a full multidimensional MRSI dataset.

bioschemas.name: jMRUI
